sentence.text: This case of malonic aciduria with cardiomyopathy demonstrates improvement in cardiac function attributable to LCT-restricted/fatty acid biosynthetic process-supplemented diet

Malonyl coenzyme A (CoA) decarboxylase (EC 4.1.1.9, acetyl-CoA biosynthetic process) deficiency, or malonic aciduria, is a rare inborn error of metabolism characterised by a variable phenotype of developmental delay, seizures, cardiomyopathy and acidosis.
